She performs with Pumper again in the film ''Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut'', released on August 18, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]].<ref name="nydn" /> The film is over an hour long and features Fishburne in a car, a hotel room and a [[shopping mall]].<ref name=AVNFlick>{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid."<ref name=AVNFlick/> Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid<ref name=AVNSpeaks>{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> about signing a multi-picture deal due to the initial commercial success of her debut.<ref name=TMZdeal>{{cite web | title = Porn Again: Montana Fishburne Gets New XXX Offer| author=TMZ Staff| publisher = TMZ.com| url =http://www.tmz.com/2010/08/10/porn-vivid-entertainment-montana-fishburne-multi-picture-deal-laurence-fishburne/ | date =2010-08-11 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}}</ref>
She performs with Pumper again in the film ''Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut'', released on August 18, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]].<ref name="nydn" /> The film is over an hour long and features Fishburne in a car, a hotel room and a [[shopping mall]].<ref name=AVNFlick>{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid."<ref name=AVNFlick/> Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid<ref name=AVNSpeaks>{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> about signing a multi-picture deal due to the initial commercial success of her debut.<ref name=TMZdeal>{{cite web | title = Porn Again: Montana Fishburne Gets New XXX Offer| author=TMZ Staff| publisher = TMZ.com| url =http://www.tmz.com/2010/08/10/porn-vivid-entertainment-montana-fishburne-multi-picture-deal-laurence-fishburne/ | date =2010-08-11 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}}</ref>
  +
==== Reaction ====
  +
She revealed that her father is "very hurt" about her porn career, and initially stated that she believed he would eventually view it as a positive.<ref name=nydn2/> She later stated that he had cut ties with her and that she was "no longer welcome in his life" due to her career choice.<ref name=JAMcutties>{{cite web | title = Fishburne cuts ties with daughter| author=WENN.com| publisher = WENN.com| url =http://jam.canoe.ca/Movies/2010/08/17/15048476-wenn-story.html | date =2010-08-17 | accessdate = 2010-08-24}}</ref>
  +   +
== Controversies ==
=== Prostitution ===
=== Prostitution ===
Fishburne had earlier received attention when she was arrested for [[prostitution]]. She reportedly cut a deal with prosecutors who dropped the solicitation and prostitution charges in exchange for her pleading no contest to misdemeanor criminal trespass and entering a work-alternative program.<ref name=msnbcprostitution>{{cite web | title = Montana Fishburne explains what led to porn| author=E! Entertainment Television| publisher = msnbc.msn.com| url =http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/38643392/ns/today-entertainment/ | date =2010-08-10 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}}</ref>

She reportedly cut a deal with prosecutors who dropped the solicitation and prostitution charges in exchange for her pleading no contest to misdemeanor criminal trespass and entering a work-alternative program.<ref name=msnbcprostitution>{{cite web | title = Montana Fishburne explains what led to porn| author=E! === Assault charge ===
â
She revealed that her father is "very hurt" about her porn career, and initially stated that she believed he would eventually view it as a positive.<ref name=nydn2/> She later stated that he had cut ties with her and that she was "no longer welcome in his life" due to her career choice.<ref name=JAMcutties>{{cite web | title = Fishburne cuts ties with daughter| author=WENN.com| publisher = WENN.com| url =http://jam.canoe.ca/Movies/2010/08/17/15048476-wenn-story.html | date =2010-08-17 | accessdate = 2010-08-24}}</ref>
  â   â
==Assault charge==
 
In August, 2010, Fishburne was charged by the L.A. City Attorney's Office with simple battery and false imprisonment stemming from an incident in which she allegedly broke into the victim's home, forcing the woman into a bathroom where she allegedly assaulted her.<ref name=msnbcassault>{{cite web | title = Montana Fishburne to be charged with assault| author=Access Hollywood| publisher = msnbc.msn.com| url =http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/38685047/ns/today-entertainment/ | date =2010-08-12 | accessdate = 2010-08-24}}</ref>
